oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Comparisons
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National Film Board of Canada.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: B&W, 28 min. A Canadian film that follows the sequence of events in three weddings, one in English rural Canada, one in a small Brazilian town, and one in a Nigerian town. One is supposed to note the similarities and the differences, but the viewer has to do his own work. The approach is documentary rather than anthropological.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: National Film Board of Canada.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Ethnographic and Anthropological Films - Egypt and Beyond
